title: Relationship of Variables
text: This refers to how the different variables or elements are connected or interact with one another, and should be considered for what kind of research you are conducting.

title: Aspect
text: Narrowing your focus to a particular angle or topic.

title: Validity
text: Validity refers to the accuracy and reliability of your research, which should not be a key concern in the early brainstorming stages.

title: Methodology
text: The approach or strategy used to gather and analyze data is important to consider for whether the research question is feasible.
